sect2.title: Installing the Server-side components
sect2.para: The installation and package that you download is different depending on the operating system you plan to use.

listitem.para: Download the appropriate package for your operating system.
Use the script to install to all nodes in your environment.
sudo /opt/HPCCSystems/sbin/install-cluster.sh <packagename> Note: The installation packages will fail to install if their dependencies are missing from the target system.

sect2.title: Installing the ECL library to your ECL IDE source folder
sect2.para: The HDSF-to-HPCC Connector library is a single ECL file containing three MACROs. These steps explain how to install to your ECL source repository.

listitem.para: Download the .ZIP file from the portal.
Extract the contents of the zip file to the ECL IDE source folder. Make sure to enable the option to keep the folder structure within Zip file.
The ECL Source folder is typically located at C:\Users\Public\Documents\HPCC Systems\ECL\My Files.
To locate your source folder, refer to your ECL IDE preference, located at Preferences >> Compiler >> ECL Folders.
